title: Half-Life 2 HD hi-res Props Texture Overhaul Pack HL2
description:
<a href="http://hl2.gamebanana.com/skins/136418" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://hl2.gamebanana.com/skins/136418</a>

Basically, there are other good retexture mods out there for HL2 props, but most of them have not been adequately done. This mod attempts to fill the gap between what has already been done with other user mods and what vanilla textures already look good.

IMPORTANT NOTICE:
This mod is intended to be used *in conjunction with* FakeFactory's Cinematic Mod (though it can definitely be used as a stand-alone, too!)

Regular installation (stand-alone):
Extract .vpk files to
c:/program files (x86)/steam/steamapps/common/hl2/custom

How to combine with Cinematic Mod:
1. Download and install cinematic mod (steampipe version)
2. Download GFCscape and use it to open the .vpk files (HDprops-themanclaw.vpk)
3. Extract the contents of each .vpk file into c:/program files (x86)/steam/steamapps/common/CM2013/hl2/custom/1_CMlooseFiles

...That's it. You're done. When placed in that folder, HL2 will choose my files if there are any conflicts.

Please feel free to distribute and use this mod in any way you wish (other than sell), so long as you give "themanclaw" credit. 

Please visit http://hl2.gamebanana.com/skins/136418 for more information and updates!
